mapper.select: select inoutpatientId, projectName, unit, bigproJectId, price from inoutpatienttype where inoutpatientId = #{inoutpatientid}
mapper.insert: insert into inoutpatienttype(projectName, unit, bigproJectId, price) values (#{projectname}, #{unit}, #{bigprojectid}, #{price})

insert into inoutpatienttype(projectName, unit, bigproJectId, price) values
(#{entity.projectname}, #{entity.unit}, #{entity.bigprojectid}, #{entity.price})

insert into inoutpatienttype(projectName, unit, bigproJectId, price) values
(#{entity.projectname}, #{entity.unit}, #{entity.bigprojectid}, #{entity.price})
on duplicate key update projectName = values(projectName), unit = values(unit), bigproJectId = values(bigproJectId), price = values(price)
mapper.update:
update inoutpatienttype
projectName = #{projectname},
unit = #{unit},
bigproJectId = #{bigprojectid},
price = #{price},
where inoutpatientId = #{inoutpatientid}
